Library Detectors
Last Published: 2012-06-08  | Version: trunk-SNAPSHOT
Overview
  • Introduction
  • Changes

Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

To use Library Detectors in a maven project, include the following in your pom.xml: 

    <plugins>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId>
        <artifactId>findbugs-maven-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>2.5</version>
        <configuration>
          <plugins>
            <plugin>
              <groupId>com.overstock.findbugs</groupId>
              <artifactId>library-detectors</artifactId>
              <version>trunk-SNAPSHOT</version>
            </plugin>
          </plugins>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>
    </plugins>
